title: Crocs Women's Literide 360 Pacer Sneakers
description: Go your own pace in these innovative and dynamic sneakers. In this next evolution of LiteRide, the plush LiteRide foam footbed delivers support and cushioning where your feet need it most. The Matlite Motion  upper features perforation patterns that mimic the flexibility of a knit fabric, offering the ultimate in breathability and flexibility. Step into the world-class comfort and styling of these new LiteRide 360 Pacers and feel sensational and stylish wherever life takes you.
